FuncDef: The display user-bind static command displays information about a static DHCP snooping binding table. The display user-bind static command displays information about a static DHCP snooping binding table.
CLIs: display user-bind static { { interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } | ip-address <ip-address> | mac-address <mac-address> | vlan <vlan-id> } | all } [ verbose ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays static binding entries on a specified interface.
â¢interface-type specifies the interface type.
â¢interface-number specifies the interface number.
-

interface-name specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 128 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Displays information about the static binding table with a specified IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Displays information about the static binding table with a specified MAC address.
The value is in hexadecimal notation.

Displays information about the static binding table with a specified VLAN ID.
For the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ:The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.
For the CE6885-LL (low latency mode):The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1023.

Displays static binding entries of all users.
-

Displays detailed information about the static binding table.
-
